https://tmrev.io/movie/554473-Drug Stories! Narcotic Nightmares and Hallucinogenic Hellrides 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cYBZDJUCehPaeXJszq48ABBS9ye.jpg Rescued and restored 16mm gems from a neglected genre: the classroom drug scare film. From doped-up drag-racers to spiders on speed, the best of the bunch are collected and presented. Drug Stories! Narcotic Nightmares and Hallucinogenic Hellrides
